response.share_text: #十五五规划建议发布#的相关内容，来智搜看看

share_info.tips: #十五五规划建议发布#的相关内容，来智搜看看

response.msg:
嗯，用户让我整理关于"十五五规划建议发布"的信息。我先看看搜索结果有哪些相关内容。

注意到今天是2025年10月28日，而规划建议是在2025年10月23日由二十届四中全会审议通过的，28日正式发布全文。规划建议的框架是15个部分61条，分为三大板块：总论部分阐述"十四五"成就和"十五五"总体要求；分论部分部署各领域战略任务；第三板块强调党的领导等保障措施。

规划目标方面，到2030年要实现高质量发展显著成效、科技自立自强水平大幅提高等七大目标，并为2035年基本实现社会主义现代化奠定基础。核心战略任务有几个关键点：科技创新方面要全链条突破集成电路、工业母机等"卡脖子"领域；产业升级强调"传统产业优化+新兴产业培育+未来产业布局"三重路径；民生领域提出提高居民收入占比、探索延长义务教育年限、推动房地产高质量发展。

特别关注到几个新提法：首次将"推动房地产高质量发展"写入全会公报，强调"好房子"建设和城市更新；消费领域要求"落实带薪错峰休假"；金融改革提出"积极发展股权债券等直接融资"。开放战略中，推进人民币国际化和自主可控跨境支付体系是亮点。

编制过程体现了民主参与，通过网络征求意见收到311.3万条建言，习近平总书记指示要求认真研究吸纳网民建议。国际社会也很关注，联合国驻华协调员评价其为"优秀范式"。

用户可能需要了解规划的重点内容和创新点，我会整理出框架结构、核心目标、战略任务、民生亮点和国际反响等方面，用清晰的结构呈现。规划文本正式发布是今天（10月28日）的重要事件，需要突出时效性。


“十五五”规划（2026—2030年）是基本实现社会主义现代化承上启下的关键五年。2025年10月23日，党的二十届四中全会审议通过《中共中央关于制定国民经济和社会发展第十五个五年规划的建议》（简称《建议》），并于10月28日正式发布全文。核心内容如下：```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 1, "data": {"num": [11, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955936510863", "index": 11, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760232767252", "index": 32, "label": ""}], "name": "央视新闻", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.690.690.50/002TLsr9ly8i653ifvwbtj60j60j6aai02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654005&ssig=cIn7DELxAb", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955936510863", "vType": 3}}```
### **一、规划框架与目标**
1. **整体结构**
《建议》共15部分、61条，分三大板块：```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 4, "data": {"num": [6, 13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225216305531076", "index": 6, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 13, "label": ""}], "name": "人民日报", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1018.1018.50/0033ImPzly8h8vgemh8kxj60sa0sadgw02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654004&ssig=oWSofkI8P7", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225216305531076", "vType": 3}}```
- **总论**：总结“十四五”成就，明确“十五五”的重大意义、指导思想和主要目标；
- **分论**：部署12个重点领域战略任务；
- **保障机制**：强调党的领导和法治建设等。

2. **核心目标**
- **2026—2030年目标**：高质量发展显著成效、科技自立自强水平提升、社会文明进步、民生品质提高、美丽中国建设新进展、国家安全巩固；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [5, 13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955374734117", "index": 5, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 13, "label": ""}]}}```
- **2035年远景**：人均GDP达中等发达国家水平，基本实现社会主义现代化。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 10, "data": {"num": [5], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955374734117", "index": 5, "label": ""}]}}```
人民日报
人民日报

### **二、战略任务与重点领域**
1. **科技与产业创新**
- **核心技术攻关**：全链条突破集成电路、工业母机、生物制造等“卡脖子”领域，加强基础研究和颠覆性创新；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [20, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226762050995802", "index": 20, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "中国经济周刊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226769767731911", "index": 28, "label": ""}], "name": "财联社APP", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.180.180.50/aafc85c3ly8h8vg6ezotfj2050050dfn.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654004&ssig=NOlqdy4AEC", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226762050995802", "vType": 3}}```
- **现代化产业体系**：
- 优化传统产业（矿业、机械等），推动智能制造转型；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "中国经济周刊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226769767731911", "index": 28, "label": "大v"}], "name": "中国经济周刊", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.99.99.50/67a31b1aly8h8vkfg8ws5j202s02sa9x.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654004&ssig=r4oqsDIKom", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226769767731911", "vType": 3}}```
- 培育新兴产业（量子科技、脑机接口等），布局未来产业；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [16], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 16, "label": "大v"}], "name": "南方日报", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.640.640.50/001PQmVoly8h8vgdozraej60hs0hs74y02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654005&ssig=lAoRb0kJI%2B", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "vType": 3}}```
- 发展新质生产力，因地施策防止“一哄而上”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 13, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **扩大内需与民生保障**
- **收入分配改革**：提高居民收入在国民收入中比重，扩大中等收入群体，取缔非法收入；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [21, 24], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "华夏时报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226771186188441", "index": 24, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226770814995049", "index": 21, "label": ""}], "name": "华夏时报", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1024.1024.50/6d97eb17ly8h8vgg3jt9xj20sg0shmyj.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654004&ssig=Yhta9t%2Fuas", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226771186188441", "vType": 3}}```
- **消费提振**：落实带薪错峰休假，清理住房、汽车消费限制，打造国际消费中心；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226770814995049", "index": 21, "label": ""}]}}```
- **住房政策**：构建房地产发展新模式，增加改善性住房供给，实施“好房子”建设工程。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [7, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225053935373100", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226767443039349", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```

3. **绿色发展与安全**
- **能源转型**：提高新能源供给比重，推动煤炭、石油消费达峰，建设新型电力系统；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 24, "data": {"num": [22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226767443039349", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```
- **安全屏障**：健全国家安全体系，强化粮食、能源资源安全保障。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 25, "data": {"num": [13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 13, "label": ""}]}}```

4. **高水平开放**
- 扩大服务业开放，推进人民币国际化，建设自主可控跨境支付体系；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226764932482642", "index": 30, "label": ""}]}}```
- 深化“一带一路”合作，拓展自由贸易区网络。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 28, "data": {"num": [30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226764932482642", "index": 30, "label": ""}]}}```
### **三、民生与社会事业亮点**
1. **教育医疗**
- 探索延长义务教育年限，稳步扩大免费教育范围；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 32, "data": {"num": [22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226767443039349", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```
- 提高人均预期寿命至80岁，建设生育友好型社会。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 33, "data": {"num": [16, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 16, "label": ""}, {"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226767443039349", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **社会保障**
- 划转国有资本充实社保基金，健全灵活就业人员参保机制；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 35, "data": {"num": [22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226767443039349", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```
- 完善养老服务体系，保障妇女儿童、残疾人权益。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 36, "data": {"num": [22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226767443039349", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```

3. **文化发展**
- 实施积极文化经济政策，推动文旅融合，规范网络生态。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 38, "data": {"num": [37], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226766520027321", "index": 37, "label": ""}]}}```
### **四、规划编制特色**
1. **民主参与**
- 网络征求意见收到建言超311.3万条，涵盖养老监护、公共服务等民生诉求；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 42, "data": {"num": [10, 17], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5196616070074131", "index": 17, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5196053890203869", "index": 10, "label": ""}], "name": "新华社", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.58.61.875.875.50/001R0E0aly8h8vg6xx3srj60rs0rsdko02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654005&ssig=kvgRm0aI0K", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5196616070074131", "vType": 3}}```
- 习近平总书记指示“认真研究吸纳”，体现“顶层设计与问计于民”结合。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 43, "data": {"num": [17], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5196616070074131", "index": 17, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **国际关注**
联合国驻华协调员评价：“中国的‘十五五’规划将为世界提供优秀范式”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 44, "data": {"num": [15], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "中国日报网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224597171471108", "index": 15, "label": "大v"}], "name": "中国日报网", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/002jYBzDly8hz05otgik5j60go0go75e02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654004&ssig=xwH04EruHy", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224597171471108", "vType": 3}}```
### **五、关键词速览**
| 领域 | 核心措施 |
|--------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **科技创新** | 芯片/生物制造攻关、未来产业布局 |
| **民生改善** | 带薪错峰休假、提高收入占比、延长义务教育探索 |
| **产业升级** | 传统产业智能化、房地产“好房子”建设 |
| **开放合作** | 人民币跨境支付自主化、服务业扩大开放 |
| **绿色转型** | 煤炭/石油消费达峰、新能源占比提升 |
